name: dead asleep, alternate version
description:
content warnings: while this game does not describe or depict death, it is about ghosts, and as such deals with death as a theme. several scenes in this game may cause eye strain! i am working on a version of the game that is black-and-white and higher contrast and will link to it here when it is done.

controls: use the right arrow key or "d" to play this game.

this is an alternate version of a game i made using bitsy for the sleepy jam
